titles.title: A resolution relative to the death of the Honorable Ernest F. Hollings, former United States Senator for the State of South Carolina.
A resolution relative to the death of the Honorable Ernest F. Hollings, former United States Senator for the State of South Carolina.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution declares that the Senate has heard with profound sorrow and deep regret the announcement of the death of the Honorable Ernest F. Hollings, former Senator for South Carolina.
